Texto: 
surgical resection.
avidly enhancing, well circumscribed mass in trigone of the right lateral ventricle with a trapped temporal horn.
intraventricular meningioma
• meningioma
• choroid plexus papilloma
• ependymoma
• subependymoma
• oligodendrolgioma
42 year old woman with headaches.
